Package Overview

The TSOC Data Analysis package is organized into the following main modules:

Core Analysis Modules - Power System Analytics Module - Load calculations, generator categorization, and reactive power analysis - Operating Point Extractor Module - Representative operating points extraction using K-means clustering

Data Processing Modules - Excel Data Processor Module - Excel file loading and data preprocessing - Power Data Validator Module - Comprehensive data validation and quality assurance

Configuration and Utilities - System Configuration Module - Central configuration hub and shared utilities - Power System Visualizer Module - Visualization and plotting functions

User Interface - Power Analysis CLI Module - Command-line interface and main execution functions

Quick Import Guide

For most use cases, you can import directly from the main package:

from tsoc_data_analysis import (
    # Core analysis functions
    calculate_total_load,
    calculate_net_load,
    extract_representative_ops,

    # Data loading
    loadallpowerdf,

    # Configuration
    FILES,
    REPRESENTATIVE_OPS,

    # Validation
    DataValidator,

    # Main execution
    execute
)

For advanced usage or specific module access:

# Import specific modules
from tsoc_data_analysis import (
    power_system_analytics,
    operating_point_extractor,
    system_configuration
)

# Access module-specific functions
from tsoc_data_analysis.power_system_analytics import get_load_statistics
from tsoc_data_analysis.operating_point_extractor import loadallpowerdf
